verses.verse: Yet now hear <S%H8085><s%>, O Jacob <S%H3290><s%> my servant <S%H5650><s%>, and Israel <S%H3478><s%>, who I have chosen <S%H977><s%>:

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> that made <S%H6213><s%> thee <S%H3335><s%>, and formed thee from the womb <S%H990><s%>, who will help <S%H5826><s%> thee <S%H3372><s%>: Fear not <S%H3290><s%>, O Jacob my servant <S%H5650><s%>; and thou <S%H3484><s%>, Jeshurun, whom I have chosen <S%H977><s%>.

For I will pour <S%H3332><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> upon him that is thirsty <S%H6771><s%>, and streams <S%H5140><s%> upon the dry ground <S%H3004><s%>; I will pour <S%H3332><s%> my Spirit <S%H7307><s%> upon thy seed <S%H2233><s%>, and my blessing <S%H1293><s%> upon thine offspring <S%H6631><s%>:
and they shall spring up <S%H6779><s%> among <S%H996><s%> the grass <S%H2682><s%>, as willows <S%H6155><s%> by the <S%H4325><s%> watercourses <S%H2988><s%>.

One shall say <S%H559><s%>, I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>'s; and another shall call <S%H7121><s%> himself by the name <S%H8034><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%>; and another shall subscribe <S%H3789><s%> with his hand <S%H3027><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and surname <S%H3655><s%> himself by the name <S%H8034><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, the King <S%H4428><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and his Redeemer <S%H1350><s%>, Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>: I am the first <S%H7223><s%>, and I am the last <S%H314><s%>; and besides <S%H1107><s%> me there is no God <S%H430><s%>.

And who <S%H7121><s%>, as I, shall call, and shall declare <S%H5046><s%> it <S%H6186><s%>, and set it in order for me <S%H7760><s%>, since I established the ancient <S%H5769><s%> people <S%H5971><s%>? and the things that are coming <S%H857><s%>, and that shall come <S%H935><s%> to pass <S%H5046><s%>, let them declare.

Fear <S%H6342><s%> ye not <S%H7297><s%>, neither be afraid: have I not declared <S%H5046><s%> unto thee of old <S%H227><s%>, and showed <S%H8085><s%> it <S%H5707><s%>? and ye are my witnesses. Is there <S%H3426><s%> a God <S%H433><s%> besides <S%H1107><s%> me <S%H6697><s%>? yea, there is no Rock; I know not any <S%H3045><s%>.

They that fashion <S%H3335><s%> a graven image <S%H6459><s%> are all of them vanity <S%H8414><s%>; and the things <S%H2530><s%> that they delight in shall not profit <S%H3276><s%>; and their own witnesses <S%H5707><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> not <S%H3045><s%>, nor know: that they may be put to shame <S%H954><s%>.
Who hath fashioned <S%H3335><s%> a god <S%H410><s%>, or molten <S%H5258><s%> an image <S%H6459><s%> that is profitable <S%H3276><s%> for nothing <S%H1115><s%>?

Behold <S%H2270><s%>, all his fellows shall be put to shame <S%H954><s%>; and the workmen <S%H2796><s%>, they are of men <S%H120><s%>: let them all be gathered together <S%H6908><s%>, let them stand up <S%H5975><s%>; they shall fear <S%H6342><s%>, they shall be put to shame <S%H954><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>.

The smith <S%H1270><s%> maketh an axe <S%H4621><s%>, and worketh <S%H6466><s%> in the coals <S%H6352><s%>, and fashioneth <S%H3335><s%> it with hammers <S%H4717><s%>, and worketh <S%H6466><s%> it with his strong <S%H3581><s%> arm <S%H2220><s%>: yea <S%H7457><s%>, he is hungry, and his strength <S%H3581><s%> faileth <S%H369><s%>; he drinketh <S%H8354><s%> no water <S%H4325><s%>, and is faint <S%H3286><s%>.

The carpenter <S%H2796><s%> stretcheth out <S%H5186><s%> a line <S%H8279><s%>; he marketh it out <S%H8388><s%> with a pencil <S%H8279><s%>; he shapeth <S%H6213><s%> it with planes <S%H4741><s%>, and he marketh it out <S%H8388><s%> with the compasses <S%H4230><s%>, and shapeth <S%H6213><s%> it after the figure <S%H8403><s%> of a man <S%H376><s%>, according to the beauty <S%H8597><s%> of a man <S%H120><s%>, to dwell <S%H3427><s%> in a house <S%H1004><s%>.

He heweth him down <S%H3772><s%> cedars <S%H730><s%>, and taketh <S%H3947><s%> the holm-tree <S%H8645><s%> and the oak <S%H437><s%>, and strengtheneth <S%H553><s%> for himself one among the trees <S%H6086><s%> of the forest <S%H3293><s%>: he planteth <S%H5193><s%> a fir-tree <S%H766><s%>, and the rain <S%H1653><s%> doth nourish it <S%H1431><s%>.

Then shall it be for a man <S%H120><s%> to burn <S%H1197><s%>; and he taketh <S%H3947><s%> thereof <S%H2552><s%>, and warmeth himself <S%H5400><s%>; yea, he kindleth it <S%H644><s%>, and baketh bread <S%H3899><s%>: yea <S%H6466><s%>, he maketh a god <S%H410><s%>, and worshippeth <S%H7812><s%> it <S%H6213><s%>; he maketh it a graven image <S%H6459><s%>, and falleth down thereto <S%H5456><s%>.

He burneth <S%H8313><s%> part <S%H2677><s%> thereof in <S%H1119><s%> the fire <S%H784><s%>; with part <S%H2677><s%> thereof he eateth <S%H398><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%>; he roasteth <S%H6740><s%> roast <S%H6748><s%>, and is satisfied <S%H7646><s%>; yea <S%H2552><s%>, he warmeth himself <S%H559><s%>, and saith, Aha <S%H1889><s%>, I am warm <S%H2552><s%>, I have seen <S%H7200><s%> the fire <S%H217><s%>.

And the residue <S%H7611><s%> thereof he maketh <S%H6213><s%> a god <S%H410><s%>, even his graven image <S%H6459><s%>; he falleth down <S%H5456><s%> unto it and worshippeth <S%H7812><s%>, and prayeth <S%H6419><s%> unto it <S%H559><s%>, and saith, Deliver <S%H5337><s%> me <S%H410><s%>; for thou art my god.

They know <S%H3045><s%> not <S%H995><s%>, neither do they consider: for he hath shut <S%H2902><s%> their eyes <S%H5869><s%>, that they cannot see <S%H7200><s%>; and their hearts <S%H3826><s%>, that they cannot understand <S%H7919><s%>.

And none calleth <S%H7725><s%> to mind <S%H3820><s%>, neither is there knowledge <S%H1847><s%> nor understanding <S%H8394><s%> to say <S%H559><s%>, I have burned <S%H8313><s%> part <S%H2677><s%> of it in <S%H1119><s%> the fire <S%H784><s%>; yea <S%H644><s%>, also I have baked bread <S%H3899><s%> upon the coals <S%H1513><s%> thereof <S%H6740><s%>; I have roasted flesh <S%H1320><s%> and eaten <S%H398><s%> it <S%H6213><s%>: and shall I make the residue <S%H3499><s%> thereof an abomination <S%H8441><s%>? shall I fall down <S%H5456><s%> to the stock <S%H944><s%> of a tree <S%H6086><s%>?

He feedeth <S%H7462><s%> on ashes <S%H665><s%>; a deceived <S%H2048><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%> hath turned him aside <S%H5186><s%>; and he cannot deliver <S%H5337><s%> his soul <S%H5315><s%>, nor say <S%H559><s%>, Is there not a lie <S%H8267><s%> in my right hand <S%H3225><s%>?

Remember <S%H2142><s%> these things <S%H3290><s%>, O Jacob, and Israel <S%H3478><s%>; for thou art my servant <S%H5650><s%>: I have formed <S%H3335><s%> thee <S%H5650><s%>; thou art my servant: O Israel <S%H3478><s%>, thou shalt not be forgotten of me <S%H5382><s%>.

I have blotted out <S%H4229><s%>, as a thick cloud <S%H5645><s%>, thy transgressions <S%H6588><s%>, and <S%H6051><s%>, as a cloud, thy sins <S%H2403><s%>: return <S%H7725><s%> unto me <S%H1350><s%>; for I have redeemed thee.

Sing <S%H7442><s%>, O ye heavens <S%H8064><s%>, for Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath done <S%H6213><s%> it <S%H7321><s%>; shout, ye lower parts <S%H8482><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>; break forth <S%H6476><s%> into singing <S%H7440><s%>, ye mountains <S%H2022><s%>, O forest <S%H3293><s%>, and every tree <S%H6086><s%> therein <S%H3068><s%>: for Jehovah hath redeemed <S%H1350><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, and will glorify <S%H6286><s%> himself in Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, thy Redeemer <S%H1350><s%>, and he that formed <S%H3335><s%> thee from the womb <S%H990><s%>: I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, that maketh <S%H6213><s%> all things <S%H5186><s%>; that stretcheth forth the heavens <S%H8064><s%> alone <S%H7554><s%>; that spreadeth abroad the earth <S%H776><s%> (who is with me?);

that frustrateth <S%H6565><s%> the signs <S%H226><s%> of the liars <S%H907><s%>, and maketh diviners <S%H7080><s%> mad <S%H1984><s%>; that turneth <S%H7725><s%> wise <S%H2450><s%> men backward <S%H268><s%>, and maketh their knowledge <S%H1847><s%> foolish <S%H5528><s%>;

that confirmeth <S%H6965><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of his servant <S%H5650><s%>, and performeth <S%H7999><s%> the counsel <S%H6098><s%> of his messengers <S%H4397><s%>; that saith <S%H559><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, She shall be inhabited <S%H3427><s%>; and of the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, They shall be built <S%H1129><s%>, and I will raise up <S%H6965><s%> the waste places thereof <S%H2723><s%>;
that saith <S%H559><s%> to the deep <S%H6683><s%>, Be dry <S%H2717><s%>, and I will dry up <S%H3001><s%> thy rivers <S%H5104><s%>;

That saith <S%H559><s%> of Cyrus <S%H3566><s%>, He is my shepherd <S%H7462><s%>, and shall perform <S%H7999><s%> all my pleasure <S%H2656><s%>, even saying <S%H559><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, She shall be built <S%H1129><s%>; and of the temple <S%H1964><s%>, Thy foundation shall be laid <S%H3245><s%>.
